newsitem.title: USA: Intek Diversified Corp redeems debentures.
newsitem.headline: Intek Diversified Corp redeems debentures.

text.p: Intek Diversified Corp said on Friday that it had redeemed all its outstanding 7.5 percent convertible debentures due February 6, 2000.

Intek said it paid a redemption premium of 10 percent and all accrued and unpaid interest due under the plan. The company also said it funded the redemption with a loan by Securicor Communications Ltd, Intek's largest shareholder.
The transaction halves the previously anticipated interest charge of $800,000, of which $325,000 was recorded in the quarter ended March 31,1997, to a $400,000 interest expense, the company added.
Intek Diversified Corp provides communications services and products using wireless technology.
